officialTitle: A Double-blind, Randomized, Multi-center Study to Investigate the Endometrial Safety of a Continuous, Combined, Oral Estrogen/Progestin Preparation (17b-estradiol [E2] / Drospirenone [DRSP]) and to Compare the Bleeding Pattern of Subjects Treated With E2 / DRSP With the Bleeding Pattern of Subjects Treated With E2 / Norethisterone Acetate (NETA) When Used for Hormone Therapy (HT) for 1 Year in Post-menopausal Women
summary: The study is designed to investigate the safety of the investigational product for the lining of the uterus (endometrium).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants in the DRSP/E2 Group With an Assessment of Endometrial Hyperplasia or Worse at End of Study (EoS) (1 Year of Treatment)
